constituent: evidence, say, words, keitai, mouth, correct, one, ceiling, stop, footprint
heisigStory: Words that testify to the correctness of some fact are classified as evidence. (Here we see a good example of how the more common primitive element takes the "strong" position to the left, even though it has more strokes.)
koohiiStory1: Your words must be absolutely correct if you plan to use them as evidence.
koohiiStory2: If what you say is indeed correct, we could use use your testimony as evidence.
myStory: bằng chứng. nói đúng cần bằng chứng
